short_description: Outputs a summary of approximate percentiles on values of a column and grouped by one or more columns.
long_description: Outputs a summary of approximate percentiles on values given by a column and grouped by one or more columns. The rank of each output value is guaranteed to be within <N * relative_error / 100> of the rank of the corresponding percentile, where <N> is the number of summarized values.

input_tables.name: InputTable
input_tables.description: Specifies the table containing the input data.

argument_clauses.name: Target_Column
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the column for which we want to compute the quantile summary.

argument_clauses.name: ErrorRate
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the acceptable error rate, expressed using decimal representation. The input value must be no less than 0.01 and no greater than 50.0. The default value is 1.0.

argument_clauses.name: Group_Columns
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the columns to group the data by.
